dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2123 IH: NFIP Extension Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Garbarino introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the NFIP Extension Act of 2025.

section.header: Extension of the National Flood Insurance Program

subsection.text: Section 1309(a) of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4016(a)) is amended by striking September 30, 2023 and inserting September 30, 2025.
Section 1319 of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4026) is amended by striking September 30, 2023 and inserting September 30, 2025.
If this Act is enacted after March 14, 2025, the amendments made by subsections (a) and (b) shall take effect as if enacted on March 14, 2025.
